pages.text: Flame Spell Essence contains the concentrated magical properties of fire. Extracted from the Flame Flower Bloom, it embodies the volatile yet controlled nature of flame.

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: When cast directly, Flame Essence releases a small fireball in the direction you're facing, causing fire damage to entities and potentially igniting blocks.$(br2)Mana Cost: [value]$(br)Single-use when cast directly

pages.title: Extraction
pages.text: The extraction process requires a Flame Flower Bloom and specific catalysts to stabilize the fiery essence during transformation.

pages.title: Applications
pages.text: - Direct casting for offense$(br)- Grafting onto a Living Staff$(br)- Crafting fire-resistant items$(br)- Creating heat-based magical devices$(br)- As a catalyst in other fire-related magical processes
